<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Un-enroll a user from a specified group."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/groups/{groupid}/enroll-user/multi"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Un-enroll a user from a given group.

**Permissions:**
`Teacher`, `Admin`, `SuperAdmin`, `Consumer`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"The organization ID of the group.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"groupid","in":"path","description":"The ID of the group.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully un-enrolled user from the group.","content":{}},"400":{"description":"Bad request.  Check request parameters.","content":{}},"401":{"description":"Invalid authorization token. Please provide a valid token.","content":{}},"403":{"description":"User is not authorized to perform this action.","content":{}},"404":{"description":"Group or user not found.","content":{}},"425":{"description":"Access token has expired. >
